comments: Mr. Reed is an awesome professor and clinical instructor. Pay attention in class and read the powerpoints. Don\'t get overwhelmed with the Pharm exam it is difficult if you over study. My advise is to study meds by systems. Read the chapters before studying the powerpoint but he is very clear and concise. You will be fine.
